name: Freddie Hubbard
description: '''Frederick Dewayne Hubbard''' (April 7, 1938 â€“ December 29, 2008) was an American [[jazz]] trumpeter. He played [[bebop]], [[hard bop]], and [[post-bop]] styles from the early 1960s onwards. His unmistakable and influential tone contributed to new perspectives for modern jazz and bebop.
